column3: 2015. local florists send gifts middletown.... samuel shelton
column6: passed away thursday evening at st. vincent regional hospital in anderson. he was born in war creek
column10: the son of robert and nannie johnson shelton. he had worked for 32 years at anaconda wire in anderson and retired from fisher body in marion. he had lived in middletown since 1960 and was a member of the mounds baptist church and the nra. he loved collecting and trading guns. he was preceded in death by his parents
column13: nick and stanley and 1 sister: elsie noble. he is survived by his wife of 70 years: pernia (moore) of middletown
column16: norma ross (jerry) of middletown and richard (diana) shelton of anderson
column17: 2 sisters: susie lucas and nellie cundiff
column19: 32 great grandchildren and 2 great great grandchildren
column20: several nieces and nephews. a celebration of his life will be held on tuesday at 3:00 pm at ballard and sons
column22: middletown with rev. cliff richardson officiating. burial will follow in miller cemetery. friends may call on tuesday from noon until the time of the services. memorials may be made to the mounds baptist church. online at: www. ballardandsons. com the ballard family is honored to celebrate the life of sam with family and friends. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
